colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES DAG SNANG RDZUN RIS SGYU MA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR GYI NANG TSAN BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR YANG ZAB GDAMS PA'I RGYAL PO 'DI YANG, SGRUB KHANG SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE NAS BGRANGS 'PHRENG DANG, RDOR DRIL BCAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, PADMOS RJES BZUNG PADMA DRAG PO TZAL LAM, MING GZHAN ^GONG MA CHEN PO'I LUNG GI ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MIN HAN DU BOD PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS BZHI STE DGA' LDAN BSAM TAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
